mapper.select: select t1.year, t2.label,t2.value,t1.tid ,t2.project_name,COUNT(*) num from ( select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year,tm.team_id tid,tm.user_id,pd.name,pd.type pType,pd.id ,pd.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id LEFT join pro_project pp on pp.id=ay.rel_id LEFT JOIN team_user_relation tm ON tm.team_id=pd.team_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.user_type='2' and pp.del_flag='0' GROUP BY tm.user_id UNION select SUBSTRING(g.sub_time,1,4) year,tm.team_id tid,tm.user_id,g.p_name name,g.type pType,g.id ,g.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from g_contest g LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=g.actyw_id LEFT join pro_project pp on pp.id=ay.rel_id LEFT JOIN team_user_relation tm ON tm.team_id=g.team_id where g.sub_time is not null and g.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.user_type='2' and pp.del_flag='0' GROUP BY tm.user_id UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year ,tm.team_id tid,tm.user_id,pm.p_name name,pm.pro_category pType,pm.id,pm.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id LEFT join pro_project pp on pp.id=ay.rel_id LEFT JOIN team_user_relation tm ON tm.team_id=pm.team_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.user_type='2' and pp.del_flag='0' GROUP BY tm.user_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and d.del_flag='0' and p.del_flag='0' UNION select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='7,' and d.del_flag='0' and p.del_flag='0' ) t2 on t1.pid=t2.pid where 1=1 GROUP BY year ,label

select t1.year, t2.label,t2.value,t1.tid ,t1.name,t2.project_name,count(*) as num from ( select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year,tm.id tid,pd.name,pd.type pType,pd.id ,pd.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id LEFT JOIN team tm ON tm.id=pd.team_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.del_flag='0' UNION select SUBSTRING(g.sub_time,1,4) year,tm.id tid,g.p_name name,g.type pType,g.id ,g.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from g_contest g LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=g.actyw_id LEFT JOIN team tm ON tm.id=g.team_id where g.sub_time is not null and g.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.del_flag='0' UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year ,tm.id tid,pm.p_name name,pm.pro_category pType,pm.id,pm.actyw_id ,ay.rel_id pid from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id LEFT JOIN team tm ON tm.id=pm.team_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null and tm.del_flag='0' ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and d.del_flag='0' UNION select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='7,' and d.del_flag='0' ) t2 on t1.pid=t2.pid where 1=1 GROUP BY year,label
select t.name from sys_office t where t.grade='2' and t.del_flag='0'

select * from ( select SUBSTRING(g.sub_time,1,4) year from g_contest g LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=g.actyw_id where g.sub_time is not null and g.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null UNION select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null ) m group by year order by year

select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and p.del_flag='0' UNION select d.label ,d.value ,p.project_name,p.pro_type,p.id pid from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='7,' and p.del_flag='0'

select s.label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join project_declare p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='project_style' left join sys_user u on p.leader=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id where (p.proc_ins_id is not null or (p.status is not null and p.status!=0)) and p.del_flag='0'
and p.apply_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.apply_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select s.label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join g_contest p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='competition_type' left join sys_user u on p.declare_id=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id where p.proc_ins_id is not null and p.del_flag='0'
and p.sub_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.sub_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select ifnull(s.label,s2.label) label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join pro_model p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s.type='competition_type' and p.pro_type='7,' left join sys_dict s2 on s2.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s2.type='project_style' and p.pro_type='1,' left join sys_user u on p.declare_id=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id where p.sub_status='1' and p.del_flag='0'
and p.sub_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.sub_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select s.label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join project_declare p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='project_style' left join sys_user u on p.leader=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where (p.proc_ins_id is not null or (p.status is not null and p.status!=0)) and p.del_flag='0'
and p.apply_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.apply_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select s.label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join g_contest p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='competition_type' left join sys_user u on p.declare_id=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where p.proc_ins_id is not null and p.del_flag='0'
and p.sub_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.sub_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select ifnull(s.label,s2.label) label,o.name,count(1) cc from team t left join pro_model p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s.type='competition_type' and p.pro_type='7,' left join sys_dict s2 on s2.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s2.type='project_style' and p.pro_type='1,' left join sys_user u on p.declare_id=u.id left join sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where p.sub_status='1' and p.del_flag='0'
and p.sub_time >=str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and p.sub_time <date_add(str_to_date(#{year},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), interval 1 year)
group by s.label,o.name

select s.label,DATE_FORMAT(p.apply_time,"%Y") name,count(1) cc from team t left join project_declare p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='project_style' left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where (p.proc_ins_id is not null or (p.status is not null and p.status!=0)) and p.del_flag='0' group by s.label,DATE_FORMAT(p.apply_time,"%Y")

select s.label,DATE_FORMAT(p.sub_time,"%Y") name,count(1) cc from team t left join g_contest p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value='1' and s.type='competition_type' left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where p.proc_ins_id is not null and p.del_flag='0' group by s.label,DATE_FORMAT(p.sub_time,"%Y")

select ifnull(s.label,s2.label) label,DATE_FORMAT(p.sub_time,"%Y") name,count(1) cc from team t left join pro_model p on t.id=p.team_id left join sys_dict s on s.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s.type='competition_type' and p.pro_type='7,' left join sys_dict s2 on s2.value=p.type and p.type!='1' and s2.type='project_style' and p.pro_type='1,' left join team_user_relation tu on tu.team_id=t.id and tu.del_flag='0' and (tu.state='0' or tu.state='4') and tu.user_type='1' where p.sub_status='1' and p.del_flag='0' group by s.label,DATE_FORMAT(p.sub_time,"%Y")
